headline: Show HN: I have made a comic book using only code
description:
Hi HN,

I am making an online comic book that respects all of the HN rules of what a good website should be : no JS, no tracking. I have even gone a step further : no assets and no dependencies. One can do really cool things using HTML and CSS only.

Please visit at least two pages for the full experience by clicking on 次 at the bottom. The text is in Japanese please forgive me for this and enjoy the concept more than the content. Also if you are a Japanese speaker, the text has not been proofread and likely contains language mistakes)

To create the illustration I use two tools.

With https://www.pixelartcss.com/ I create CSS from video game tiles

I use the following to create the illustrations from the tiles : https://www.thecodingfox.com/interactive/pixel-world-editor/
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 我只用代码做了一本漫画书
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 我只用代碼做了一本漫畫書
description_zh-Hans:
Hi HN,

我正在制作一本在线漫画书，它遵守了一个好网站应该具备的所有HN规则：没有JS，没有跟踪。我甚至更进一步：没有资产，没有依赖性。

请点击底部的次，至少访问两个页面，以获得完整的体验。文字是日语，请原谅我，享受概念胜过内容。另外，如果你是一个讲日语的人，文本没有经过校对，很可能包含语言错误）

为了创建插图，我使用了两个工具。

用https://www.pixelartcss.com/我从视频游戏的瓷砖中创建CSS

我用以下方式从瓷砖中创建插图。 https://www.thecodingfox.com/interactive/pixel-world-editor/
